analysis_level.description: default <<all>>. Compute only sensor <<1>>. Compute only activation <<2>>. Compute only connectivity <<3>>. combination of them <<12>> OR <<23>>. <<4>> Using a structural template. <<5>>Using data spectral. and analysis with individual data input of them <<all>>

run_by_trial.description: default <<false>>. The time series of different trials are analyzed independently <<true>> or they are combined in a single time serie <<false>>

run_frequency_bin.description: default <<true>>. Frequency components are analyzed independentlly <<true>> or according to a band structured sparsity model corresponding to smoothness in the spectral domain <<false>>

system_response.description: default <<false>>. Decide wheather the souces are responsive for all frequencies or not when applying sSSBL z-scores. <<false>> (apply z-scores indepoendentlly for all frequencies) <<true>> (apply z-scores jointly for all frequencies)
